tutorials.name: Zendesk app quick start
tutorials.description: In this 15-minute quick start, you'll use the Zendesk Apps framework to access ticket data.

tutorials.name: Building your first Support app
tutorials.description: The app will display the requester's name, any tags applied to the requester, when they were added and more

tutorials.name: Building your first Sell app
tutorials.description: The “Related Leads” app displays new leads for an organization associated with a deal.

tutorials.name: Building your first Chat app
tutorials.description: The app “Learn More” is designed to let a chat agent send a visitor links to more information about any subject.

tutorials.name: Building a server-side app
tutorials.description: Because a Zendesk app runs in an iframe, you can use a server-side web application to generate the content for the iframe.

tutorials.name: Using React in a Support app
tutorials.description: In this tutorial, you'll use React to create a Zendesk Support app.

tutorials.name: Adding third-party OAuth to a Support app
tutorials.description: In this tutorial, you'll create a private Zendesk Support app that uses an oauth setting to manage third-party OAuth access tokens.

tutorials.name: Dynamically changing app icons
tutorials.description: In this tutorial, you'll create a top bar app that changes its icon based on data from a third-party API.
